snippet: Rumor and raw nerves over Russia’s intentions reverberated on Monday throughout Crimea.
abstract: Rumors and raw nerves over Russia's intentions reverberate throughout Crimea; talk turns more to war, even as actual fighting remains hearsay and imaginary for Ukraine's Crimean Peninsula of two million inhabitants with little history of open ethnic conflict.

byline.contributor: David M. Herszenhorn contributed reporting from Sevastopol, and Patrick Reevell from Lubimovka, Ukraine.

lead_paragraph: Rumor and raw nerves over Russia’s intentions reverberated on Monday throughout Crimea.

headline.main: Frayed Nerves in Crimea as Rumors of War Spread
headline.print_headline: Frayed Nerves in Crimea as Rumors of War Spread
